title: Bring this Take Care Talk to Life (optional)
pseudonyms: Demonstrate safe merchandising of fitness weights
steps: Take relevant team members to the fitness weights fixtures on the selling floor and demonstrate the safe merchandising of fitness weights in accordance with the planogram.
bestPractice: Follow the planograms to merchandise and refresh fitness weights.
Do not double stack dumbbell Shelf Ready Packaging (SRPs) or hex dumbbells.
Turn hex dumbbells longways onto shelf to prevent rolling.
Ensure the locking mechanism is in place for the weight plate stands.
Check fitness weight displays are merchandised to planograms, including shelf capacity limits, notch guidance, use of decks and risers where specified, and planogram safety alerts are followed.
caveats: Note. K Hubs to follow the merchandising guidance described in point 7 above.
